edu.scu.oop.assign2

Class Alpha2Oven

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.scu.oop.assign2.Alpha1Oven
      • edu.scu.oop.assign2.Alpha2Oven

  • public class Alpha2Oven
extends Alpha1Oven
    This class represents a smart oven that extends Alpha1Oven functionality and provides options to set cooking mode and temperature(in C)
